name: Club
description: A club is the base sale entity and may be referred to as 'Product', too. It is the central thing that may be bought by Buyers and sold by Customers.

name.description: The name of the club / product / saleEntity

franchise_name.description: The franchise_name of the club / product / saleEntity

description.description: A description HTML content for the club

price.description: The default price tag for the club (may be overwritten by a calendar entry for a time span)

capacity.description: The default capacity for the club (may be overwritten by a calendar entry for a time span)

openingHours.description: An object holding opening hours (format: TODO)

saleUnit.description: The sale unit (either DAY or HOUR, refer this as an ENUM)

responsibleFname.description: The name of a club representative (may not be shown to Buyer!)

responsibleLname.description: The name of a club representative (may not be shown to Buyer!)

responsibleTel.description: The phone number of a club representative (may not be shown to Buyer!)

status.description: Use for knowing club all details are fillup or not

address.description: The address of the clubs location

media.description: Each club has various media which is related through this relation

offers.description: Each club must have one or more offers that a customer may use

ratings.description: A Buyer can post a club rating which is held by the club

customer.description: Each Club is created by a Customer (the 'Club Owner') and belongs to this user entity

tax.description: Each Club has exactly one VAT which is referred to as TAX

planningEntries.description: Each Club has planningEntries which overwrite default price and capacity for time spans

additions.description: Each Club may offer costly additions to a stay (= a Ticket/Pass)

baseCurrency.description: Each Club has a base Currency it is created and sold in (and payed out in)

manager.description: Each Club has one manager who is responsible to that club
